description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Jonny Crush is a full-out 3D first-person shooter, filled with intense bug-killing action. Experience the thrill of taking down swarms of up to one-thousand bugs in a single level. Unlock your weapons on a point-based system, as well as having the opportunity to be one of the top ten players in the world. The combos you make with your guns are limitless.
description.short: Jonny Crush is a full-out 3D first-person shooter, filled with intense bug-killing action. Experience the thrill of taking down swarms of up to one-thousand bugs in a single level. Unlock your weapons on a point-based system, as well as having the opportunity to be one of the top ten players in the world. The combos you make with your guns are limitless.
